synopsis.text: Eight years ago, tragedy struck when the parents of Gu Chi and Jiang Lan were killed in a car accident. Jiang Lan took pity on the orphaned Gu Chi and adopted him as her younger brother. Now young adults, Gu Chi works as a rising model while Jiang Lan is an established supermodel. Though raised as siblings, Gu Chi's feelings for his adoptive sister have grown into romantic love over the years. However, Jiang Lan still sees him only as a younger brother. As they navigate life and their careers together, Gu Chi grapples with his unrequited love. He worries that confessing his feelings might jeopardize their familial bond. Meanwhile, Jiang Lan remains unaware of his inner turmoil. This complicated romance explores the lines between familial and romantic love. Will Gu Chi find the courage to share his heart? Can Jiang Lan see him as anything more than a brother? Though the odds seem stacked against them, perhaps this destining pairing can find their way together after all.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
